long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension to view the status of different Layer 2 blockchains at a glance. 

Stats
- Price
- Latest Block + Transaction Count
- Gas Price
- TVL

Layer 2 Chains
- Base
- Polygon
- Arbitrum
- Arbitrum Nova
- Optimism

Additional Cards
- Watchlist
- Shortcuts
- Trending
- News
- Gas Guzzlers
- Word of the Day

No wallet connection required. This extension does not write to the blockchain.
